0x022.name: Cutoff Emergency
0x022.description: A critical error is detected and the cutoff will now shut down the car

0x042.name: Cutoff Heartbeat
messages: Flags indicating the status of the cutoff module

0x521.name: Normal Shutdown
0x521.description: The cutoff receives a signal and begins shutdown normally

0x522.name: Non-Critical Error
0x522.description: The cutoff encounters an error that isn't critical enough to necessitate shutdown
